column1: mrs. peggy sue wall henley. aug 6
column11: peggy was the daughter of the late charles and frances rush wall. she was employed with the department of motor vehicles
column12: and was a member of caraway united methodist church in greensboro. in addition to her parents
column13: she was also preceded in death by her husband
column18: and roger wall. she is survived by a sister
column19: betty jo wall pipes and husband
column27: ga; and several nieces and nephews. funeral will be 1:00 p. m. monday in the chapel of cumby family funeral service in archdale
column28: officiated by rev. tim mc. cann. interment will follow in the mt. gilead united methodist church cemetery. the family will receive friends one hour prior to the service at the funeral home. in lieu of flowers
column29: memorials can be made to the mt. gilead united methodist church cemetery fund
column32: nc 27350. upcoming events. visitationjun 22. 12:00 pm cumby family funeral service - archdale206 trindale road. archdale
